summary.span: 實作標準主控台 (Console) 記錄器，該記錄器會在組建 (Build) 期間輸出事件資料至主控台視窗。

span.span: Implements the standard console logger that outputs event data to the console window during a build.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設主控台記錄器不需要釋放任何資源。The default console logger does not need to release any resources. 這個方法不會有任何作用。This method does nothing.
